q: Dick Cheney made a surprise appearance Thursday at the Conservative Political Action Committee Convention to present the former two-time defense secretary an award. The vice Barack Obama joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Mr. Barack Obama than the Barack Obama 's current advisers. In Israel, where leaders have worried that the turmoil might jeopardize the country's peace treaty with Egypt, Benjamin Netanyahu welcomed reassurance from the military council that it respects all regional and international obligations and treaties. A total of 18 artifacts disappeared from the Egyptian Museum during the demonstrations and riots, including two statues of King Tutankhamun, Zahi Hawass , head of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on his website.
